headline: PPG livery to appear in NASCAR Cup Series and NTT INDYCAR SERIES
summary: STRONGSVILLE, Ohio, February 03, 2025--PPG livery to appear in NASCAR Cup Series and NTT INDYCAR SERIES. Vibrant color scheme will be featured at Brickyard 400 in July.
